speaker: HARRIS
sentence: Well, again, with all due respect, you know, I -- after the last debate, for example, I went to a place in Florida called Homestead, and there is a private detention facility being paid for by your taxpayer dollars, a private detention facility that currently houses 2,700 children.
politifact_statement: Kamala Harris "I went to a place in Florida called Homestead, and there is a private detention facility being paid for by your taxpayer dollars  a private detention facility  that currently houses 2,700 children."
verified_claim: Says children at Homestead migrant facility "get 30 minutes over a month to talk to family members. If they were in a prison  a federal prison  they would get 300 minutes."
verified_claim_article_title: Yes, children at Homestead facility get far less time to call family than federal prisoners  PolitiFact Florid
